name: sign-search
description: Search Sign Language Dictionaries intelligently with word2vec and traditional more brute force approaches

scripts.watch: rm lib/bundle.js.gz; ./node_modules/.bin/watchify lib/user-interface.js -o lib/bundle.js -v -i fs-extra -i crypto -i process -d --full-paths
scripts.build: ./node_modules/.bin/browserify lib/user-interface.js -o lib/bundle.js -v -i fs-extra -i crypto -i process; gzip -9 -k -f lib/bundle.js

openGraph.description: Find Sign is an Auslan Search Engine. It helps find Auslan resources from around the internet in one place. Deaf community can send websites and videos to include and help make Auslan vocabulary easier to find.
openGraph.title: Find Sign - Auslan Search Engine

author: Phoenix Fox
